column1: In  Miles,  1925,  the  question  was  whether  Judge  Samuel  J.  Graham’s  salary  should  be
included in his gross income for the purpose of income tax.

column2: in  O’Malley  vs.  Woodrough  et  al.,  1939  was

column1: Woodrough’s annual salary of $12,500 having been included in the net income for the purpose
of income tax. It was done under section 22 of the Revenue Act of 1932. The said section
